title: What is the proper way to dispose of non- rechargable household batteries (C, A, AAA etc,) and CFL lightbulbs?
text:
Non-vehicle battery recycling is rare. Though New Hanover County does
offer recycling, batteries aren't included in this. But here is a
site where you can send old batteries and still stay 'green.' 

http://www.batteryrecycling.com/residential
